content.rendered:
[vc_row][vc_column video_bg=”yes” video_bg_url=””][vc_column_text]

Condé Nast Traveller Reader’s Choice Awards 2024

Each year, prestigious international magazine Condé Nast Traveller encourages readers to rank their favourite destinations and travel companies in the Reader’s Choice Awards survey.

We invite you to take a few minutes to cast your vote and spread the word about our property. Click here to begin and share your experience. The Esplanade Zagreb is nominated in the following category: Hotels. Voting for the 2024 Reader’s Choice Awards has already begun. You could even win a trip!

We sincerely appreciate your support and look forward to seeing you again soon at the Esplanade Zagreb Hotel.

 

Truly yours, The Esplanade Team

 

Published May 2024

[/vc_column_text][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner][vc_separator][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row]

excerpt.rendered: The travel magazine Condé Nast Traveler invites you to vote for your favorite destinations and travel companies in the 2024 Reader’s Choice Awards.
